title: Determined To Live
description: Pushed to her limit, Canada is out for revenge. But will that revenge turn her into someone else, someone even she doesn't like? Will is missing again, and it's up to the two people who should never be left unsupervised to find him. Will Canada and Jake be able to keep their hands - and other body parts - to themselves? Or will Canada finally give into the temptation and risk losing everything she holds sacred? Who will be killed, who will live, and who will become one of the undead? Find out who has been keeping secrets, and how those secrets change everything.
author: C.M. Wright
